accessLevel.description: If set to true, this record can only be viewed by the logged in user.
accessLevel.name: accessLevel

assigned.externalId.description: References an existing employee record. This defaults to the logged in user.In order to retrieve a list of available values for this field, use the GetSelectValue operation. For more information, see getSelectValue of the Platform Guide.
assigned.externalId.name: assigned.externalId

assigned.internalId.description: References an existing employee record. This defaults to the logged in user.In order to retrieve a list of available values for this field, use the GetSelectValue operation. For more information, see getSelectValue of the Platform Guide.
assigned.internalId.name: assigned.internalId

assigned.name.description: References an existing employee record. This defaults to the logged in user.In order to retrieve a list of available values for this field, use the GetSelectValue operation. For more information, see getSelectValue of the Platform Guide.
assigned.name.name: assigned.name

company.externalId.description: In order to retrieve a list of available values for this field, use the GetSelectValue operation. For more information, see getSelectValue of the Platform Guide.
company.externalId.name: company.externalId

company.internalId.description: In order to retrieve a list of available values for this field, use the GetSelectValue operation. For more information, see getSelectValue of the Platform Guide.

company.name.description: In order to retrieve a list of available values for this field, use the GetSelectValue operation. For more information, see getSelectValue of the Platform Guide.
company.name.name: company.name

completedDate.description: Enter the date the subject for this call was concluded.This field can be useful if the call required a follow-up or call back or was not completed on the call date for another reason.
completedDate.name: completedDate

contact.externalId.description: Select the contact for this company in relation to this cal.The contacts in this field are the contacts attached to the company selected above. Click Open next to the Company field to add contacts to a company's record.
contact.externalId.name: contact.externalId

contact.internalId.description: Select the contact for this company in relation to this cal.The contacts in this field are the contacts attached to the company selected above. Click Open next to the Company field to add contacts to a company's record.
contact.internalId.name: contact.internalId

contact.name.description: Select the contact for this company in relation to this cal.The contacts in this field are the contacts attached to the company selected above. Click Open next to the Company field to add contacts to a company's record.
contact.name.name: contact.name

customForm.externalId.description: References an existing custom form for this record type. To ensure that field relationships defined within a desired custom form are maintained, you must provide the customForm value. Also, if defaults are off, then customForm is required, if defaults are on then the default form is used. Internal ID values for existing forms can be found at Setup > Customization > Entry Forms. In order to retrieve a list of available values for this field, use the GetSelectValue operation. For more information, see getSelectValue of the Platform Guide.
customForm.externalId.name: customForm.externalId

customForm.internalId.description: References an existing custom form for this record type. To ensure that field relationships defined within a desired custom form are maintained, you must provide the customForm value. Also, if defaults are off, then customForm is required, if defaults are on then the default form is used. Internal ID values for existing forms can be found at Setup > Customization > Entry Forms. In order to retrieve a list of available values for this field, use the GetSelectValue operation. For more information, see getSelectValue of the Platform Guide.
customForm.internalId.name: customForm.internalId

customForm.name.description: References an existing custom form for this record type. To ensure that field relationships defined within a desired custom form are maintained, you must provide the customForm value. Also, if defaults are off, then customForm is required, if defaults are on then the default form is used. Internal ID values for existing forms can be found at Setup > Customization > Entry Forms. In order to retrieve a list of available values for this field, use the GetSelectValue operation. For more information, see getSelectValue of the Platform Guide.
customForm.name.name: customForm.name

endDate.description: Note: The time component from this field represents the hour/minute of when the phone call ended. The UI to Web services equivalent is as follows:Call Date -> startDate (date component)From -> startDate (time component)To -> endDate (time component
endDate.name: endDate

message.description: Enter notes on the context and decisions made in this phone call.You can enter up to 999 characters.
message.name: message

reminderMinutes.value.description: Select the amount of time before the start time for this call when you would like to set a reminder for the organizer.You must check the Block Out Time box to set a reminder.You must also select a reminder type to set the reminder.
reminderMinutes.value.name: reminderMinutes.value

reminderType.value.description: Select the type of reminder the call organizer should receive before the start time of this task.You must check the Block Out Time box to set a reminder.Email reminders are sent to the email address on the employee record of the organizer.Popup reminders appear only if the organizer is logged in to his or her NetSuite account.You must also set a time in the Reminder field to set a reminder.
reminderType.value.name: reminderType.value

startDate.description: Enter the date of this call.Click the calendar icon to choose the date from the calendar.
startDate.name: startDate

status.value.description: Reference to a value in a system list. Values: _scheduled, _completed.
status.value.name: status.value

supportCase.externalId.description: In order to retrieve a list of available values for this field, use the GetSelectValue operation. For more information, see getSelectValue of the Platform Guide.
supportCase.externalId.name: supportCase.externalId

supportCase.name.name: supportCase.name

timedEvent.description: Check this box to schedule this call on the calendar of the person organizing the call.Enter the start and end times in the From and To fields.This time is scheduled on the calendar for the phone call date.
timedEvent.name: timedEvent

title.description: Enter the subject of this phone call.You can enter up to 100 characters.
title.name: title
